title: The Beguiled
synopsis: Rooster-in-the-hen house Eastwood gets taken down a peg (and a leg) by the residents of Miss Martha Farnsworth Seminary for Young Ladies in Siegel’s seamy Southern Gothic psychological thriller, based on Thomas P. Cullinan’s 1966 novel of the same…

title: Hackers
synopsis: Legally forbidden from touching a computer for seven years after a legendary hack, prodigy cyberwarrior Dade Murphy, aka “Zero Cool,” aka “Crash Override” (Jonny Lee Miller) logs back on for his 18th birthday, falls in with a gang of fellow teen…

title: East Palace, West Palace
synopsis: One of the first films from Mainland China to explore queer life, Zhang’s film revolves around a young gay writer who, pinched by police during a night raid in a Beijing park, recounts his troubled childhood, sexual awakening, and ongoing search for…
